titleInfo.title: The Hoffman-Wielandt inequality in infinite dimensions

mods.abstract: The Hoffman-Wielandt inequality for the distance between the eigenvalues of two normal matrices is extended to Hilbert-Schmidt operators. Analogues for other norms are obtained in a special case.
